Examples¶

Overview¶

The embARC platform comes with a large range of examples using the various OS, middleware and peripherals supported in embARC. These examples provide a useful reference and starting point for embARC developers for their own applications. The .elf files of the following examples can be loaded through JTAG, or the .bin files through SD card by secondary bootloader.

  • Examples and Demos
Examples in embARC OSP¶
Example Directory Example Document Link
example/baremetal/arc_feature/cache ARC Cache Example
example/baremetal/arc_feature/timer_interrupt ARC Timer Interrupt Example

example/freertos/iot/coap/coap_server example_iot_coap_coap_server

example/freertos/sec/mbedtls/ssl/server2 example_sec_mbedtls_ssl_server2

The repository embARC Applications contains various applications based on embARC OSP, developed by the embARC team and community.

  • AWS IoT Smarthome Application
  • AWS IoT Smarthome Multi-node Application
  • iBaby Smarthome Application
  • iLight SmartDevice Application
  • OpenThread Smarthome Application

Application Note¶

The following application notes provide step-by-step instructions on a broad range of topics to familiarize you with the use of embARC.

  • Quick start guide
  • Adding a new NT-Shell command
  • How to create your own peripheral modules for use with the ARC EMSK and embARC
  • Timer and ISR
  • Using a secondary bootloader on the EMSK
  • Using a smart home IoT application with EMSK

Note

Confirm that the version of the embARC and board is the correct one as noted in the application note documents
